item.title: About Us
item.description: Agreeable Educational Services Agreeable Educational Services (AES) is the premier resource for educational services in the state of Illinois. We only trust AES with our school services and administration. Angelo will work hard for you. Angelo A. Rivera Jr. Ed.S., NCSP - President & CEO Angelo is the sole AES employee and will work hard for you. Board Certified Excellent References 10+ years of experience CPS background Bacchantum neque.
